<div id="clickGameContainer" style="display:flex; flex-direction:column; align-items:center; justify-content:center; min-height:80vh; gap:20px;">
  <button id="clickButton" style="font-size:48px; padding:30px 60px;">Click Me!</button>
  <p style="font-size:32px;">Clicks: <span id="clickCount">0</span>/10</p>
</div>

<script>
let clicks = 0;
let paywall = false;
const countDisplay = document.getElementById("clickCount");
const button = document.getElementById("clickButton");

button.addEventListener("click", function() {
    if(paywall) return;
    clicks++;
    countDisplay.textContent = clicks;

    if(clicks === 5) {
        paywall = true;
        alert("Pay $4.99 to continue clicking!");
        button.disabled = true;
    }

    if(clicks >= 10) {
        alert("You win!");
        button.disabled = true;
    }
});
</script>
